Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 79th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1965...
Injured on 6/11/1967 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 6/20/1968, off Donnie Ketcham (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/23/1969, off Stanton Archibald (CI)...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1971...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 3/1/1979 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/6/1980 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
